message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product!
I'm looking to get a good deal, can you meet me at $90?
I can do a bit better than that, but I need to make a profit
I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at $92?
I can see you're serious about the product, but I need to make a fair profit
I'm willing to meet you halfway, can you meet me at $98?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate
I'm getting close to my budget, can you meet me at $102?
I'm not willing to go any lower, this is my final offer
I'm really close to my budget, can you meet me at $105?
